list_definition.definition: a machine with keys for printing letters on a piece of paper

list_ex_of_english: She rushes to the desk and typewriter in front of the sofa.
I had had some ideas of writing and had bought myself a secondhand typewriter.
A group of chimpanzees is given some hallucinogen and is set loose on the famous typewriters.
Only 4 were frequent users of the typewriter: 2 of these combined this with frequent use of the pen or pencil.
Ironically, the final emptying out of local meaning coincided with the introduction of the typewriter.
It would save all users a great deal of time and trouble (only think of the typewriter!).
Let us fly further down towards the river - we are now facing two superimposed alignments of concrete structures whose abstract staccato-like design seems to have been 'drawn' with a typewriter.
A contact microphone placed inside the typewriter was used for the live processing of the acoustic sound it produced.
